name: 2019 4th International Conference on Renewable Energy and Smart Grid
content: 2019 4th International Conference on Renewable Energy and Smart Grid (ICRESG 2019) 28-31 March, 2019|China, Hangzhou Web: http://www.icresg.org/ 2019 4th International Conference on Renewable Energy and Smart Grid (ICRESG2019). ICRESG 2019 is co-organized by Auckland University of Technology, American University of Madaba (AUM) and Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers(HKSME), technically sponsored by Shanghai Jiao Tong University and Zhejiang University. The conference will be hosted in Hangzhou, China from Mar.28-31, 2019! ●Publication Information 1) Author can submit full paper to publish in the volume of Conference Proceedings , which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Conference Proceedings Citation Index – Science (CPCI-S)(Thomson Reuters, Web of Science), Inspec and other indexing organizations. 2) Author can submit an abstract firstly, then, submit full paper after the conference to publish in the special issues of following international journals. 1\. Protection and Control of Modern Power Systems(ISSN: 2367-0983) ●ICRESG 2019 Speaker Prof. Tianshou Zhao, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Hong Kong Fellow of ASME, Fellow of RSC ,Cheong Ying Chan Professor of Engineering and Environment,Director of the HKUST Energy Institute Senior Fellow of the HKUST Jockey Club Institute for Advanced Study Prof. Gareth Taylor，Brunel University London, UK Module Leader - MSc Sustainable Electrical Power，Director of BIPS - Brunel Institute of Power Systems Prof. Yi Ding, Zhejiang University, China Editor of IEEE Transactions on Power Systems,Editor of IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics Prof. Guojie Li , Shanghai Jiao Tong University, China IEEE PES Senior Member,Protection and Control of Modern Power Systems: Editorial Board.The third power quality and flexible transmission Standardization Technology Committee: member Prof. Qiuwei Wu, Technical University of Denmark, Denmark Prof. Keyou Wang, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, China IEEE PES Member,IET Generation, Transmission & Distribution: Associate Editor Dr. Daming Zhang , University of New South Wales, Australia ●Topics(http://www.icresg.org/CFP.html) Renewable Energy Smart Grid ●Paper Submission Submission Email:icresg @smehk.org Submission System: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/ICRESG2019 ●Call for participants 1,Presenter: As presenter, you need to submit the abstract and title of your presentation before register.Send email to icresg@smehk.org for further information. 2,Listener: You are welcome to attend this great event. You need to complete the registration as Listener before the registration dealdine.Send email to icresg@smehk.org for further information. 3,Reviewer: We sincerely welcome experts in the areas of Renewable Energy and Smart Grid join the conference as reviewer .
